content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Got7__disambig_1

}}
This is a list of awards and nominations received by Got7, a South Korean boy band formed by JYP Entertainment, since their debut in 2014. The group has received a total of 55 awards out of 190 nominations.
__TOC__
